I sure hope so cause I'd love to see Russ sharing that big cock with another dude and maybe getting his first taste of dick himself.This second helping starts out with Russ kicked back in a chair in Mike's hotel room wearing a cap which I find sexy as all get out on this country boy. Russ is up for it but first he's gotta deal with the matter at hand and that's his nice fat cock that he's already stroking and his beautiful balls that he seems to love playing with.
title: Russ, Scene #01
